lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because:
I need atleast 200,000 US $ in order to 1. Finish my MBA (15,000US$) and 2. About 185,000US$ start my export and import business in Uganda.
I promise good returns depending on Venture capital injected. I have been there before as Employee and now needs to be there as Business partner.
lender.occupational_info:
PROFESSIONAL RESUME OBJECTIVE Application for either Loans, Venture Capitalist, Equity Partners. BIODATA NAME: WADRI DEMAH JOEL DATE OF BIRTH : 27/02/1969 KIJOMORO – NYORI, ARUA DISTRICT, UGANDA. CONTACT: P.O. BOX 29504 KAMPALA, UGANDA. PHONE +256 772 479 682/ +256 752 500 350/ +256 752 501 035 • • E-MAIL joelwadeh@yahoo.com, agisicom-consult-ug@hotmail.com
EDUCATION 2004 – 2006 Masters in Business Administration Student.( NEVER COMPLETED)  Electives: - International Marketing, Operations Management & Strategy & Financial Markets.) Damelin Postgraduate School of Business Sciences South Africa / Oxford Brookes University UK
1990-1994 Makerere University Kampala  Bachelors of Science Botany/Zoology 3:2:1 Options: Applied Entomology/Parasitology/Micro Biology
1999 Management Training Advisory Centre, Nakawa.  Certificate in Microsoft Office , Internet Email & Computer Applications 1988-1990 St. Joseph’s College Ombachi Advanced Level Certificate in Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Math and General Paper
1982-1985 Mvara Secondary School  Ordinary Level Certificate
1973-1979 Pakayo Primary School  Primary Leaving Certificate
AWARDS RECEIVED Company Innovation in Pest Control , Disease and Fertilizer award, Best Salesman Award achieving Turnover of 2,000,000 US $ per annum, Best Information Technology Student Distinction Award from MTAC,
CORE COMPETENCIES Research: Consultancy:- Organizational Development: Management:- Business: - Agriculture:- Environmental Health & Hygiene Vector Control Disease Control:- Ethics & Integrity: Procurement Logistics, & Supplies SKILLS Leadership, Negotiations, Visionary and Objectivity, Marketing , Salesmanship & Public Relations , Customer Care, Management Information Systems, Research, Innovation, Investigation, Research Orientation,
VOLUNTEER EXPERIENCE • Poverty Alleviation Programmes for Rural Communities, 2000 -2006 • HIV/AIDS Nsambya Youth Project, 2005 – 2007 • Farmers and Stockist Training on Agronomy, Pre and Post Harvest Technologies, Agribusiness etc, 1996 – 2006. • SMEs Training on Innovation Management and Dissemination. 2004 - 2006 WORK EXPERIENCE 2006-2007 Agri Inputs Industrial Services Uganda, Agisicom Consultancy Services, Director. • Procurement Agency and Logistics Services to Southern Sudanese Businessmen. • Transportation Cargo Broker. 1999-2005 Agri Inputs Industrial Services Uganda, Agisicom Consultancy Services, Pestmasters Fumigation Services Ltd, Industrial Construction Services & Property Holdings Limited. Kampala, Uganda. Chief Executive Director  Offered Leadership for above Companies, Consultancy on Turnkey Agro Projects,  Innovator and in charge Estate Management and Development Project in Uganda.
1999-2003 Agri Inputs Industrial Services Uganda, Agisicom Computer Services Consultancy Services, Kampala, Uganda. Managing Director  Offered Leadership for above Company, Consultancy on Turnkey Agro Projects,  Commission Agency on Export and Import of Agri-Inputs (i.e. Seeds, Agrochemical, Machinery, Industrial chemicals) and Agro produce.  Trainer in Computer Application i.e. MS Office Suite, Internet and Email, Desktop Publishing, Accounting Packages, Data base Management Programs ,
2003-2004 Ernest Well Services Ltd Business Development Manager  Innovator of Sanitation projects outside Uganda  Achieved Sales of 0.5 to 2.0 million US $ per annum.  Implemented Training courses s  Organization of Business meetings between CEO’s NGO’s on issues of Sales, and Purchases.
1998-1999 Dembe Trading Enterprises Ltd Agriculture Manager  Innovator of Trade in Seeds, Pesticides, and Fertilizers etc.  Achieved Sales of 1.5 million US $ per annum..  Liaising on Turn key Agro Projects  In charge of Sales Management, Forecast, Budget, Registration of Production in Ministry of Agriculture, National Drug Authority. NARO etc.
1996-1998 Balton Uganda Limited Agriculture Sales Manager.  Increased Sales 200,000 US $ to 1 million US $ per Annum.  Managed 3 Representatives and 15 Agents  Trained new Sale Recruits, Stockiest Farmers, and Agents on production and usage.  Liaising on Consultancy on Turnkey Agriculture Project.  In Charge of Sales Management, Sales Forecast, Budget, Corporate Clients, New Markets etc.  Identification of New Suppliers Overseas and Communicating between the Executive of two Companies.
1995-1996 Balton (U) Limited. Salesman (later promoted to) Representative.  Sales of Agri-inputs (Seeds, Pesticides, Fertilizers and Farm Machinery) Countrywide.  Product Training, Promotion, and Marketing.  Market Research.  Offered Entomological Training for Antipest fumigation services. LANGUAGES English, Kiswahili, Lugbara, Kakwa, Lingala HOBBIES Football, Movies, Dancing REFERENCES  Dr. Evert Van Djik Damelin School of Post Graduate Business Sciences South Africa., evertdyk@worldonline.co.za  Obaya Maurice UNEB Kampala Tel: +256 772 438815  Mr. Chris Edemaga, Operations Director Pest Masters Fumigation Services Uganda limited. Tel: +256 772 654 002  Mr. Mark Wood APEP. lender.occupational_info: I would describe my work as uplifting and inspirational, because their are alot of women and families in certain situations that they fill like they can't get out of because they don't have the resources or training. By giving them the resources they need to change their situation. It creates a better life for them and their children. Which creates a better tomorrow for all of us. It takes some people off the streets and out of prostitution, drugs, and etc.

lender.name: Richard Vanderhurst
lender.occupational_info: Richard Vanderhurst, recognized as one of the nation’s leading authorities on Search Engine Optimization, teaches the most advanced techniques along with the best kept secrets behind Google's current web search algorithm to senior techs worldwide.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: someone introduced me to this website!

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I feel very priveledged that when God was deciding who went where, I ended up in America. To American standards, I am a broke college student trying to raise two kids. Yet, I know I have way more than a huge majority of people on this earth. By loaning, I can at least those who have less than me a chance to improve their life.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student. I am planning on studying global politics or intercultural communications while also studying Spanish. After I get my BA I plan to go to law school. I then would like to work with international charities to improve the lives of people in South America.

lender.name: Christie F.
lender.loan_because: My sister gave it to me as a birthday present. I didn't know about kiva before
lender.occupational_info: I work in an elementary school during the day and as a waitress at night.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: God commands that I should love others. This is a great opportunity to do that in a practical way!

lender.name: Oliver
lender.loan_because: People on the earth are got to help each other and the world will be more beautiful.
lender.occupational_info: I work to get overseas tourists to experience the life and culture of China, and provide more oppurtunities for them to exchange ideas with Chinese people in the way of travelling.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I believe that one person really can make a difference.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: I spent many years repaying my own student loans, so I'm grateful to be able to lend to others for whom the loans will make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I direct a mentor program that helps law students learn about different kinds of career paths for lawyers.

lender.name: Bennette Evangelista
lender.loan_because: I believe that the only way to alleviate poverty is through business and by creating jobs.
lender.occupational_info: I own my own consulting company, and I try to align my values with my practice. I had more than 20 years of corporate experience and I aim to work on projects that has a balanced and sustainable approach.

lender.name: Luke
lender.loan_because: Proverbs 21:13 13 If a man shuts his ears to the cry of the poor, he too will cry out and not be answered.
lender.occupational_info: I study film production at Grand Valley State University in Michigan. I am also involved in a church where I play Guitar am also involved in both local and international missions. I believe that it is the duty of those who have plenty to assist those with little. God has blessed me with so much and I can't help but share it with His Children!

lender.name: Richard Vanderhurst
lender.occupational_info: Richard Vanderhurst, teaches students how the Internet has revolutionized the way small businesses communicate and reach new customers more effectively. Multimillion dollar companies already benefit from the use of SEO and in his classes Richard Vanderhurst shows how important it is for customers to find businesses of all sizes quickly and effectively.

lender.name: Tracy Tompkins
lender.loan_because: of this quote from Muhammed Yunus (1997), “We have created a slavery-free world, a smallpox free world, and an apartheid-free world. Creating a poverty-free world would be greater than all these accomplishments while at the same time reinforcing them. This would be a world that we could all be proud to live in.”

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Many of the governments around the world are corrupt and not interested in improving the lives of the citizenry. Person-to-person lending like Kiva provides a way to bypass such government mistreatment and improve lives and opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired and work part-time at an auto repair shop as accountant and bookkeeper helping the business stay healthy and keeping the paperwork from being a burden to the owner and workers.

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: I really like to see the entrepreneurs everywhere to be successful in their endeavors to contribute to their communicties' economy and in the mean time make a good living for themselves by working hard, by being creative and by their ingenuity.
lender.occupational_info: I help my company reduce cost and increase productivity by putting resources to work in the best possible way.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: How cool is it to be able to help someone far away in such a personal way? It is a way to help others as Jesus commands us to while preserving dignity and potentially helping an entire community.
lender.occupational_info: I manage finances for a business.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I understand what it's like to not have money when you need it the most.

lender.name: EMMANUEL
lender.loan_because: i like the idea of been able to help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a warehouse, its only a temporary job, but im glad that its helping me do a lot of things i want, and also be able to help my parents.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: everyone should have the opportunity to pursue a dream - and money is a social construction

lender.name: zachariah
lender.loan_because: If my family ever needed help I would like to think you would help us
lender.occupational_info: I help surgeons operate in a clean and sterile enviorment

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: Small loans work well.
lender.occupational_info: UN employee

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I've been fortunate to have a pretty good life, and hope to help others to improve their situation.
lender.occupational_info: I design programs to help prevent people from getting injured while working.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.occupational_info: I study! I really want to contribute to space science in some way and help enable humans to exploit those infinite resources outside of Earth to help everyone.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference for those less fortunate. I want to give others hope. As Gandhi famously quoted: "Be the the change you wish to see in this world."

lender.name: carla
lender.loan_because: I want to do my part in alleviating poverty
lender.occupational_info: I get to sing all day with kids!

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I want to help others get started.
lender.occupational_info: I design and implement computer network infrastructure components and shared services, such as internet access, email systems, and web servers.

lender.name: Frode
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help people improve their lives and contribute to growth in their community.
lender.occupational_info: Online banking development

lender.name: Mirjam
lender.loan_because: ....Why not?

lender.name: Sander
lender.loan_because: I believe this can make the difference for many local entrepeneurs to built their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: Corporate Banking

lender.name: Ryan & Ellie
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us and we want to be a blessing to others.
lender.occupational_info: Ryan; truck driver Ellie: university student

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: A very little effort on my part can make a very great difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: although I don't have much money at the moment, what I have to spare I know can change somebodies life far more than my spending it here!

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe that the solution to economic problems is good economics, of which microfinance is an example.
lender.occupational_info: I research and write on economic and political issues as a theologian, my first book being "Economic Parables" which deals with all this.

lender.name: NOELINE NAKAMYA
lender.loan_because: I am a civil servant who is about to retire yet I don't have a house of my own and I have two children whom i pay school fees for and i have some other depends whom to look after. I will be happy to get a housing loan.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Secretary in a secondary school but a low salary earner. I have worked for over 30 years, but the salary I am earning is not enough to cater for my needs plus constructing a house.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in a real way.
lender.occupational_info: I make websites and do graphic design.

lender.name: Rob aka Cerberus
lender.loan_because: "The difference between what we do and what we are capable of doing would suffice to solve most of the World's problems." (Mahatma Gandhi)
lender.occupational_info: I firmly believe that "All the knowledge and wealth we may gain in a lifetime are just worthless if we do not use them to help this Planet become a much better place for all living beings!"

lender.name: Austin
lender.loan_because: someday remains someday for far too many.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English in Japan and run a blog about personal finance called Foreigner's Finances. I love golf, public transportation, and 30 Rock.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: It seems to be a better way of putting my money to work to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I fix air conditioning equipment in big buildings.

lender.name: Stella
lender.loan_because:
I admire the people featured on this website. They don't sit back and complain, they look for opportunities to take control and make a better life for themselves and their families.
We can all learn from them.
I love reading about the different entrepreneurs and their business ideas.

lender.name: Fiona
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselves and am lucky enough to be in a position to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I deal with the issues that arise when you employ people.

lender.name: Janna
lender.loan_because: It helps people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I help doctors care for sick people

lender.name: stacie
lender.loan_because: I want to be the first in my family to open a business that they could be proud of. I am a single mom of 3 and with the ability to go the extra mile to help someone in need., is something thats always been in me. I want to demonstrate that same desire in my potential start up business venture. Thank you.
lender.occupational_info: I curently have job orders that i accumulated through my friends network, I then place unemployed, people to the job and if a match is made with the person then the job, I get a commission. Then I go to the next person looking for a job.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: I know that even a small amount of money can be a big support for someone in need. I'm fortunate enough to have a good life while most of the world's population lives in poverty. I wanna do my part to contribute to a better life for the ones most in need.
lender.occupational_info: Currently, I'm studying business administration at a local university in Frankfurt. Besides my studies, I'm working part-time for Deutsche Bank in the Institutional Asset Management department. My part-time job is related to my university programm.

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: I want to see others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I work at the University of Kansas, School of Journalism. I help journalism students learn multimedia reporting skills as well as manage some newsroom activity for our educational TV station: KUJH-TV.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I believe opportunities can change people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I understand that many of our greatest entrepreneurs started with nothing, with an opportunity, or with someone who took an interest.

lender.name: Tracie
lender.loan_because: I want to help!

lender.name: Sonia
lender.occupational_info: I work for the US government. I serve as a "judge" (hearing officer) in administrative hearings involving agricultural issues.

lender.name: Randi
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help now and then. If I can afford to provide some relief, I feel that I should.

lender.name: Shriya
lender.loan_because: I earned gift money from a graduation dance performance and I wanted to donate it to an organization where $1500 would make a big difference in someone's life from somewhere else in the world and I thought Kiva would be best! :)
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student. My hobbies are dance, traveling, art, music, writing, photography, costume design, writing, and cooking.

lender.name: Diego
lender.loan_because: We can make a difference
lender.occupational_info: International merchant

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: Jesus said, "What you do for least of these...you do for Me."
lender.occupational_info: I serve a pastor in a large church with assistance and coordination of projects; I also have a small administrative services business.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I like to help others and encourage independence and sustainability. We're all in the same boat...(Earth)
lender.occupational_info: I design "green" or sustainable buildings incorporating local, natural materials, renewable energy, and sunlight.

lender.name: Jud and Darcy
lender.loan_because: Earning is foundational
